item.title: 游艇制造商 Ferretti 在确认美国订单前下调全年指导计划
item.description: 意大利豪华游艇制造商法拉帝公司（Ferretti）周三下调了调整后核心利润（EBITDA）和收入的全年指导目标，以待其 "复合型 "游艇部门的美国订单得到确认。【原文：Italian luxury yacht maker Ferretti on Wednesday reduced its full-year guidance for adjusted core profit (EBITDA) and revenue pending confirmation of U.S. orders for yachts in its "composite" segment.】

item.title: 巴西服务业 9 月份创历史新高
item.description: 巴西 9 月份服务业活动的增长超过预期，并创下历史新高，这是在巴西央行启动货币紧缩周期以对抗通胀之后出现的经济强劲迹象。【原文：Services activity in Brazil grew more than expected in September and hit a record high, a sign of economic strength that comes after the central bank kicked off a monetary tightening cycle to fight inflation.】

item.title: 多伦多证券交易所期货在美国通胀数据公布前走低
item.description: 在当天晚些时候将公布美国关键通胀数据之前，与加拿大主要股指挂钩的期货周三小幅下跌，与华尔街同行走势一致。【原文：Futures tied to Canada's main stock index marginally fell on Wednesday, mirroring Wall Street peers, ahead of key U.S. inflation data due later in the day.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易政策被视为美国大豆种植者的 "通杀牌
item.description: 美国农民担心，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的全面关税计划将限制他们与头号大豆买家中国的贸易往来，但关税也可能吸引企业建造更多的美国压榨厂，因为他们渴望获得国内供应。【原文：American farmers are worried that President-elect Donald Trump's sweeping tariff plans will curb their access to top soy buyer China, but tariffs could also lure companies to build more U.S. crushing plants, hungry for domestic supplies.】

item.title: 大众汽车向合资公司投资 58 亿美元，Rivian 股价大涨
item.description: 周三盘前交易中，Rivian 公司股价大涨超过 13%，因为这家电动汽车制造商宣布，作为合资企业的一部分，德国大众汽车公司将投资 58 亿美元。【原文：Shares of Rivian jumped over 13% in premarket trading Wednesday after the electric vehicle maker announced a $5.8 billion investment from German automaker Volkswagen as part of their joint venture.】

item.title: 由于家居用品需求疲软，加拿大 Loblaw 公司季度收入不及预期
item.description: 加拿大超市零售商洛布劳公司（Loblaw Companies）周三公布的第三季度营收未达预期，原因是该公司对家居用品和电子产品等非必需品的需求放缓。【原文：Canadian supermarket retailer Loblaw Companies missed third-quarter revenue estimates on Wednesday, hurt by a slowdown in the demand for its non-essential goods such as household items and electronics.】

item.title: 市场等待通胀数据为美联储加息路径提供线索，期指下滑
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货走低，原因是国债收益率上扬，在关键的通胀数据公布前打压了对利率敏感的股市，这些数据将为美联储的降息步伐提供更多信号。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged lower on Wednesday as an uptick in Treasury yields weighed on rate-sensitive equities ahead of crucial inflation data that will offer more signals on the pace of the Federal Reserve's interest rate reductions.】

item.title: 亚马逊、宜家家居与其他远洋货物承运商共同推动对新型绿色燃料的需求
item.description: 亚马逊公司和宜家公司与其他约三十多家依赖海运的公司联合，将于今年 1 月首次邀请航运公司竞标一份合同，使用以电子甲醇等近零排放电子燃料为动力的船只运输货物。【原文：Amazon.com and IKEA, in alliance with about three dozen other companies that depend on ocean freight, will invite shipping firms for the first time to bid on a contract in January to move their cargo on vessels powered by near-zero emissions e-fuels like e-methanol.】

item.title: 特斯拉召回超过 2,400 辆 Cybertrucks，今年第六次召回
item.description: 特斯拉周三表示，由于失去驱动力可能会增加车祸风险，公司将在美国召回2431辆Cybertruck电动皮卡，这是特斯拉今年采取的第六次此类行动。【原文：Tesla said on Wednesday it was recalling 2,431 Cybertruck electric pickup trucks in the United States as loss of drive power could increase the risk of a crash, in its sixth such move this year.】

item.title: 贝恩：2024 年全球奢侈品销售额将下降 2%，成为有史以来最疲软的年份之一
item.description: 据咨询公司贝恩公司（Bain & Company）称，由于价格上涨和经济不确定性导致该行业的客户群缩小，今年个人奢侈品的销售额将下降 2%，成为有史以来最疲软的一年。【原文：Sales of personal luxury goods are set to fall 2% this year, making it one of the weakest on record, with price hikes and economic uncertainty shrinking the industry's customer base, according to consultancy Bain & Company.】

item.title: 解说员：取代联邦贸易委员会琳娜-汗的漫长之路
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会是拜登政府亲消费者议程的核心部分，也是企业批评的避雷针，但在特朗普政府下，该委员会领导层的更迭可能需要数月时间。【原文：A change of leadership at the U.S. Federal Trade Commission, a central part of the Biden administration's pro-consumer agenda and a lightning rod for corporate criticism, will likely take months under the Trump administration.】

item.title: 美国最高法院将审理英伟达避免证券欺诈诉讼的申请
item.description: 美国最高法院将于本周三听取英伟达（Nvidia）的辩论，英伟达试图阻止一起证券欺诈诉讼，该诉讼指控这家人工智能芯片制造商在其销售额有多大程度依赖于动荡的加密货币市场方面误导投资者。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court is set on Wednesday to hear arguments in Nvidia's bid to torpedo a securities fraud lawsuit accusing the artificial intelligence chipmaker of misleading investors about how much of its sales depended on the volatile cryptocurrency market.】

item.title: 美国 关注 CPI
item.description: 市场记者纳奥米-罗夫尼克（Naomi Rovnick）对美国和全球市场的未来一天进行展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by markets correspondent Naomi Rovnick.】

item.title: 欧洲央行希望银行更好地管理私募股权风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）周三表示，欧元区的贷款机构可能没有充分了解他们在快速增长的私人信贷和股票市场中的风险敞口，因此银行监管机构计划提出新的风险管理预期。【原文：Euro zone lenders may not have a full understanding of their exposure to the quickly growing private credit and equity markets, so bank supervisors plan to outline new risk management expectations, the European Central Bank said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，通用汽车将因变速器问题召回超过 46.1 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周三表示，通用汽车公司将因变速器问题召回461,839辆汽车。【原文：General Motors will recall 461,839 vehicles over an issue with transmission, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 西门子能源、RWE 警告称特朗普将影响美国海上风电行业
item.description: 全球最大的两家可再生能源企业周三警告说，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）领导的总统任期内，美国海上风电行业将面临挑战，并指出这项被当选总统抨击的技术可能会被推迟。【原文：Two of the world's biggest renewables players on Wednesday warned of challenges for the U.S. offshore wind sector under a presidency led by Donald Trump, flagging potential delays for the technology slammed by the president-elect.】

item.title: 安进公司认为实验性肥胖症药物不存在骨骼安全问题
item.description: 安进公司周三表示，其试验性减肥药与骨矿物质密度的变化之间没有联系，一天前的一项早期研究数据拖累其股价下跌了 7%。【原文：Amgen said on Wednesday there was no link between its experimental weight-loss drug and changes in bone mineral density, a day after data from an early-stage study dragged its stock 7% lower.】

item.title: 美国将向 Akash Systems 提供高达 1820 万美元的芯片生产资金
item.description: 美国商务部周三表示，已同意向Akash Systems公司提供高达1820万美元的政府补贴资金，以支持其为先进半导体制造业建造一个占地4万平方英尺的洁净室。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said Wednesday it has agreed to provide up to $18.2 million in government subsidy funding to Akash Systems to support the construction of a 40,000-square-foot cleanroom space for advanced semiconductor manufacturing.】

item.title: 台湾央行看到特朗普关税带来的危险
item.description: 台湾中央银行周三警告说，它从美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普即将上任的政府所提出的贸易政策中看到了危险。【原文：Taiwan's central bank warned on Wednesday that it sees peril in the proposed trade policies of the incoming administration of U.S. President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，Glencore-Chandra 新加坡炼油厂将为壳牌预留 20% 的产量
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士称，格伦科尔（Glencore）和钱德拉-阿斯利（Chandra Asri）正准备完成对壳牌新加坡地标炼油厂的收购，他们已经成立了一家新的运营公司，并将把大约 20% 的产量专门留给该厂即将离任的所有者。【原文：Glencore and Chandra Asri, gearing up to complete their takeover of Shell's landmark Singapore refinery, have set up a new operating company and will earmark roughly 20% of output for the plant's outgoing owner, sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司高管称中国在加强供应链方面发挥作用
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周三在中国最大的航空展珠海航展上表示，该公司计划重点加强供应链，而中国公司将在其中发挥作用。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer said on Wednesday at China's largest air show in Zhuhai that it planned to focus on strengthening its supply chain, with Chinese companies able to play a role.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行裁员十余名中国交易员，原因是手续费骤降
item.description: 一位知情人士告诉路透社，法国巴黎银行已在中国大陆和香港裁减了十几个职位，这是在中国市场交易放缓的情况下全球银行裁员的最新案例。【原文：France's BNP Paribas has cut a dozen jobs in mainland China and Hong Kong, a source with knowledge of the matter told Reuters, the latest among global banks to trim headcount amid a slowdown in dealmaking in the Chinese market.】

item.title: 开发银行融资承诺提前推动 COP29 峰会召开
item.description: COP29 的谈判代表们欢迎主要开发银行承诺增加向与全球变暖作斗争的贫穷和中等收入国家提供的资金，这为为期两周的峰会提前注入了活力。【原文：COP29 negotiators welcomed as an early boost to the two-week summit a pledge by major development banks to lift funding to poor and middle-income countries struggling with global warming.】

item.title: 腾讯游戏业务强劲，第三季度收入增长 8%，符合预期
item.description: 中国科技巨头腾讯控股公司周三公布，受近期推出新游戏后游戏业务增长的推动，第三季度收入增长 8%。【原文：Chinese technology giant Tencent Holdings posted on Wednesday a 8% rise in third-quarter revenue, driven by growth in its gaming business after the recent launches of new titles.】

item.title: 美国银行调查显示，特朗普获胜后，投资者预计经济将出现更多增长和通胀
item.description: 美国银行的月度基金经理调查显示，在唐纳德-特朗普赢得大选后，全球投资者改变了对全球经济的预期，现在他们认为全球经济增长会比以前更高，通胀也会更高。【原文：Global investors changed their expectations on the global economy in the wake of Donald Trump's election win, and now see higher growth than they did before, as well as higher inflation, according to Bank of America's monthly fund manager survey.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦特朗普的经济议程给全球经济和通胀回归带来风险
item.description: 法国央行行长兼欧洲央行（ECB）委员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）周三表示，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的经济议程有可能使美国重现通胀，并损害全球经济增长。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's economic agenda risks returning inflation to the United States and hurting economic growth worldwide, Bank of France head and European Central Bank (ECB) member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Seven & i 公司报告的报价和迄今为止最大的管理层收购案
item.description: 日本 Seven & i 控股公司周三表示，已收到来自公司副总裁的收购建议，该副总裁是公司创始人伊藤家族的成员。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings said on Wednesday it has received a buyout proposal from its vice president who is a member of its founding Ito family.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜可能对匈牙利经济造成双重打击
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普的胜利可能会给匈牙利领导人维克托-欧尔班带来政治上的好处，但在经济方面，特朗普对匈牙利来说是个坏消息--由于福林疲软和欧洲汽车行业可能受到的关税影响导致产量下降，从而增加了通胀风险。【原文：Donald Trump's victory may be a political boon for Hungarian leader Viktor Orban but on the economy, Trump is bad news for Hungary - adding to inflationary risks due to a weak forint and lower output due to possible tariffs on Europe's auto sector.】

item.title: 瑞穗金融集团将以 10 亿美元收购乐天卡 15%的股份
item.description: 日本瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group）周三表示，将以 1,650 亿日元（10.6 亿美元）的价格收购乐天集团子公司乐天卡（Rakuten Card）15% 的股份，进一步深化两家公司的战略联盟。【原文：Japan's Mizuho Financial Group will take a 15% stake in Rakuten Group subsidiary Rakuten Card for 165 billion yen ($1.06 billion) in a further deepening of the two companies' strategic alliance, they said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Just Eat 外卖公司以 6.5 亿美元出售美国部门 Grubhub
item.description: 欧洲最大的送餐公司 Just Eat Takeaway 周三表示，它已达成一项协议，将以 6.5 亿美元的价格把其美国部门 Grubhub 出售给 Wonder。【原文：Europe's biggest meal delivery firm Just Eat Takeaway said on Wednesday it struck a deal to sell its U.S. unit Grubhub to Wonder for $650 million.】
